entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 06 January 2023
